description:
Before Kikuru knew it, he was in charge of four trainees. And as luck would have it, all of them have their own specific issues that need ironing out.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Bolt from the Blue / Hunter in Peril
Seiten no Hekireki / Hinshi no Karyuudo
Un coup de tonnerre / Au bord du gouffre
Wie ein Blitz aus heiterem Himmel / Der sterbende Jäger
Гром среди ясного неба / Умирающий охотник
晴天の霹靂 / 瀕死の狩人
